questions.name: vet1
questions.title: Which of the following is the correct definition for: Quality of the video imagery?
choices: (A) It refers to how smooth the visual the video is.
(B) It means how perfectly does the visual in the video match with the sound.
(C) It means how fluent the audio sounds.
(D) This refers to how clear or crisp the visual is in the video.
(E) This refers to how clear or crisp the audio.
